DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, monocentric, randomized study, comparing the effectiveness and tolerance of four different dosages of hypobaric ropivacaine for unilateral spinal anaesthesia during traumatic femoral neck surgery in the elderly.
DOC.brief_title: Ropivacaine Hypobaric Spinal Anaesthesia in Traumatic Hip Surgery
DOC.criteria: older than 70 dorsal decubitus surgery ASA score 1, 2, 3 MMS score > or equal to 25 local anesthetic allergy spinal anaesthetic exclusion MMS score lower than 25
